explanation: [0-0] In front of a kitchen counter, a young man in a black T-shirt stands before a wooden table. On the table lies a watermelon with two holes carved into it. Many banknotes are stuck together, forming a strip that is threaded through the holes in the watermelon. The man in the black T-shirt, mouth open, looks down at the watermelon, holding the strip of banknotes with both hands. Scattered on the table are a few pieces of cut watermelon rind. In the background, a refrigerator and other kitchen appliances are visible.

[0-8] First, the camera zooms in. The man in the black T-shirt keeps pulling the banknotes out from the hole with his right hand. The camera zooms out. The man, mouth agape, continues to pull the banknotes out with his right hand. At this moment, the white door behind him is pulled open from the outside, and a woman in a black T-shirt, wearing glasses and holding a brown wallet in her right hand, walks in. The shot cuts to a close-up of the woman in glasses. She walks in, closes the door, puts her left hand to her face, opens her mouth wide and looks forward.
